meanings.definition: Of or relating to non-Jewish people.
meanings.sent1: The goyishe neighbors invited us to their barbecue.
meanings.sent2: She admired the goyishe artwork in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The goyishe restaurant served matzo ball soup.
meanings.sent4: His goyishe accent stood out in the synagogue.
meanings.sent5: The goyishe holiday decorations were colorful and festive.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of non-Jewish customs or traditions.
meanings.sent1: The goyishe wedding had a different ceremony.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the goyishe music playing.
meanings.sent3: The goyishe dance moves were unfamiliar but fun.
meanings.sent4: His goyishe attire clashed with the traditional clothing.
meanings.sent5: The goyishe celebration included unique rituals.
